snippet: Two brothers, Paul and Bobby Petrino, still discuss Arkansas’s coming opponents, even as they no longer share a spot on the Razorbacks’ sideline.
abstract: Arkansas offensive coordinator Paul Petrino has stayed with the college football team after his brother Bobby, the head coach, was fired for having an affair with a staff member.
lead_paragraph: Two brothers, Paul and Bobby Petrino, still discuss Arkansas’s coming opponents, even as they no longer share a spot on the Razorbacks’ sideline.

headline.seo: Bobby Petrino’s Brother, Paul, Guides Arkansas’s Offense
headline.main: One Has Left Arkansas, but Football Still Bonds Petrinos
headline.print_headline: One Has Left Arkansas, but Football Still Bonds Petrinos
